News.headline: TONIGHT: Dagenham and Redbridge Fans Forum
News.page_title: TONIGHT: Dagenham and Redbridge Fans Forum
News.URL_keywords: TONIGHT: Dagenham and Redbridge Fans Forum
News.short_description: Here at the Daggers we are hosting a fans forum in our clubhouse tonight which starts at 7:30pm
News.description:
In attendance at the forum will be Chairman Paul Gwinn, Manager John Still, Director Glyn Hopkin and Managing Director Steve Thompson. 

This will give fans an opportunity to ask any questions that they may have regarding the new investment and for Glyn Hopkin to answer any questions from the supporters of the club.
